message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I'm confident this is a fair reflection of its worth.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,300,000 is well above my budget. Given the product's value to me, I'm willing to pay $850,000. This is a fair price considering my  constraints.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing.  While your offer is appreciated, the value of this product is significantly higher.  I could consider letting it go for $1,150,000. This is a substantial reduction on my initial offer and reflects my willingness to find a compromise.

Alice, while I appreciate your willingness to compromise, $1,150,000 is still out of my range. I'm committed to finding a deal, but I can't go above $900,000.  This is a significant increase from my previous offer and I believe it reflects a fair balance of our respective needs.
